summary_text: Web services are server side items that we can easily call from client side with the help of HTTP queries. Creature has a lot of embedded out of the box web services. We can create our own web services if necessary.
key_points: Web services are server side items that we can easily call from client side with the help of HTTP queries.
Creature has a lot of embedded out of the box web services.
We can create our own web services if necessary.
